titleStmt.title: The indecency and unlawfulness of baptizing children in private, without necessity, and with the publick form seriously recommended to the consideration of both the clergy and laity of the Church of England : to which is added, a brief exhortation to the constant receiving of the Lords Supper.
titleStmt.author: Strong, Martin, b. 1663 or 4.
